channel.title: Comments on: Portrait of the week – Sierra Leone Refugee Allstars

item.title: By: Emma
item.dc:creator: Emma
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://emmamarshall.net/portrait-of-the-week-sierra-leone-refugee-allstars/#comment-9">petra hilgers</a>.
Thanks for commenting! I got the impression they would be a lot of fun to see live :-)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to petra hilgers.

Thanks for commenting! I got the impression they would be a lot of fun to see live :-)

item.title: By: petra hilgers
item.dc:creator: petra hilgers
item.description: Beautiful portrait! I'm loving how dynamic the group looks in front of those immobile mass of grey concrete. And the signpost it just perfect! Not only in the right pace to point in the right direction but all of this in the right hue of blue to match trainers, jeans, shirts... Would love to see them life now!
item.content:encoded: Beautiful portrait! I’m loving how dynamic the group looks in front of those immobile mass of grey concrete. And the signpost it just perfect! Not only in the right pace to point in the right direction but all of this in the right hue of blue to match trainers, jeans, shirts… Would love to see them life now!
